text: If you're looking for can-do, earthy-crunchy attitude then you've got to go to Wisconsin.
author: Dar Williams

text: When I was in my 20s it did occur to me that there was something perverted about an attitude that thought that killing somebody was a minor offence compared to kissing somebody.
author: John McGahern

text: You can have a laugh in Los Angeles, or you can weep in Los Angeles, depending on your attitude towards it.
author: Miranda Richardson

text: People are patronizing the theatres with renewed enthusiasm - there is an entire picnic-like attitude when families go out to see movies, which is a very good sign. They want to see larger-than-life characters on the big screen and not just watch movies on television or on DVDs.
author: Salman Khan

text: I just want to go in with the right attitude and from Day 1 make a difference.
author: Freddy Adu
